Contact Stanford News


The Stanford News Service is part of the Office of University Communications. We provide assistance to reporters and disseminate much of the university’s news. We also help to publicize and handle media relations for major events, provide media training for key faculty and administrators and serve as a liaison between scholars and media outlets.

Stanford News Office



Address:
425 Santa Teresa St.
Stanford, CA 94305-2245
[Directions]


Phone:
(650) 723-2558 (main)
(650) 725-0247 (fax)




Members of the media:
Request a subject matter expert
Request photo and copyright permissions




Stanford community:
Ask a question or share feedback about Stanford Report




The office is open from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Friday except university holidays.






What would you like to do?

Find a staff member
Find a media contact
Find a subject expert


Suggest a story
Advertise in Stanford Report
Report an accessibility issue
Report a website issue
